excerpt: Sharing 40 recipes for new years eve - the best of the best cocktails, snacks and treats! Best meals here to ring in the new year with your family and friends!

html:
Recipes

by Jessica December 27, 2024

I’ve got all my favorite snacks and drinks here for you! The best recipes for new years eve!

We always stay home on New Years’ Eve – it’s one of my favorite nights of the year. We make the best snacks and sometimes watch a movie and just ENJOY the end of the year. Nothing fancy, except for lots of cheese and champagne.

What do you do? What do you make and eat?

Major major major fingers crossed that 2024 is going to be a good one!

50 Recipes for New Years Eve

My Favorite Cheeses to Use for a Cheeseboard

Grilled Peppers Burrata and Breadcrumbs

Hot Honey Chipotle BBQ Chicken Nachos

Marinated Cheese

Hot Lobster Dip

Smashburger Fries

Chimichurri Cheese Fries

Spinach Artichoke Twists

The Easiest Artichoke Dip

Deviled Crab Dip

Everything Soft Pretzel Bites with Chipotle Beer Cheese

Whole Roasted Buffalo Cauliflower

Jarlsberg Cheese Dip

Whipped Brie with Rosemary Bacon

Caramelized Onion Hummus

Hummus Trio

Smoked Cheddar and Caramelized Onion Potato Skins

Caramelized Onion Dip

Hot Crab Dip with Old Bay Crostini

Holiday Hummus!

Whipped Goat Cheese with Hot Honey

Garlic Bread Pizza

Chipotle Caramel Chex Mix

Coconut Curry Pork Meatballs

Brown Butter Scallops with Champagne Risotto

Chili Crunch Baked Feta

Mango Avocado Shrimp Salsa

Potato Chip Salted Champagne Caramels

Pulled Pork Stuffed Peppers

Sweet + Spicy Pork Shoulder

Crispy Carnitas Guacamole

Spinach Artichoke Pull Apart Bread

Smoky Cheddar Twists

Cheeseboard with Crackling Caramel

Pulled Pork Tostadas

Caramel Pretzels

Salted Peanut Butter Rice Krispy Treats

Chocolate Dipped Champagne Marshmallows

Chewy Chocolate Chip Skillet Cookie

Hot Buttered Bourbon

Pomegranate Aperol Spritz

Winter Aperol Spritz

Spiced Orange Spritzers

Cranberry Cobbler Smash

Sorbet Prosecco Floats

Spiced Orange Gin & Tonic

Lambrusco Smash

Pomegranate Cider Mimosas

Apple Cider Prosecco Spritz

Pomegranate Cranberry Mint Juleps

Clementine Vodka Sodas

3 Ingredient Espresso Martinis
